title: Cultivating Critical Thinking in Generative AI-Supported Digital Multimodal Composition

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental digital content creation competency and practical experience in social fields
context.additional_context: A process enhancing critical thinking through generative AI-driven multimodal project development experiences by current practitioners, conducted in a BYOD environment with a collaborative revision and feedback-centered instructional structure.

learning_goals: Learners can apply a systematic framework to evaluate the reliability and validity of multimodal content generated by generative AI.
Learners critically analyze AI-generated content (AIGC) in collaborative environments and develop selective utilization strategies aligned with specific objectives.
Learners document and present decision-making processes that reflect AI’s strengths and limitations during multimodal composition.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
